import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a fleet by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/fleet/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



FindOne handles HTTP GET requests to retrieve a single fleet entity by its ID.
It parses the "id" parameter from the URL, validates it, and calls the fleetService to fetch the corresponding fleet.
If the ID is invalid, it responds with a 422 Unprocessable Entity status and an error message.
If the fleet is not found, it responds with a 404 Not Found status and the error message from the service.
On success, it returns the fleet entity with a 200 OK status.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Fleet ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"correlation_id":{"type":"string"},"created_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"deleted_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"},"id":{"type":"integer"},"name":{"type":"string"},"team_id":{"type":"integer"},"ulid":{"type":"string"},"updated_at":{"properties":{"time":{"type":"string"},"valid":{"description":"Valid is true if Time is not NULL","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}}},"404":{"description":"Not Found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
